ModMetaData.name: Theyre in the Trees
ModMetaData.author: ChickenBites84
ModMetaData.description:
Want a forest to really feel like a forest? Shooting bolts and bullets into it will now be stopped! ToWild projectiles will now face interception across several objects, benefitting raider cover in forests significantly as well as demanding more firing angle placement. Cover effectiveness of trees are setting adjustable, and intercept percent per cover effectiveness is a somewhat adjustable.
Place below tree mods. Please check mod settings.
